title: How Storyful used a start-up culture to create a legacy company (INMA - International Newsmedia ...
text: ( Source : INMA - International Newsmedia Marketing Association ) 19 October 2015 Â· By Marek Miller Storyful's six-point manifesto dictates that the company fails fast, makes in-person planning a priority, and is driven by user-oriented goals.
